name: Hydrating Facial Cleanser

details.Usage: Apply to damp skin, massage, and rinse thoroughly.

description: A gentle yet effective facial cleanser that leaves skin feeling hydrated and refreshed.

name: Daily Moisturizer SPF 30

details.Usage: Apply liberally to face and neck every morning.

description: A lightweight daily moisturizer with SPF 30 that provides hydration and sun protection.

name: Brightening Serum

details.Usage: Apply a few drops to clean skin before moisturizer, morning and night.

description: A potent serum formulated with vitamin C and niacinamide to brighten and even out skin tone.

name: Retinol Night Cream

details.Usage: Apply a pea-sized amount to clean, dry skin at night.

description: A rich night cream infused with retinol and hyaluronic acid to reduce signs of aging and hydrate skin overnight.

name: Exfoliating Facial Scrub

details.Usage: Apply to damp skin, massage gently, and rinse thoroughly. Use 2-3 times per week.

description: A gentle yet effective facial scrub that buffs away dead skin cells and leaves skin feeling smooth and refreshed.

name: Hyaluronic Acid Serum

details.Usage: Apply to clean skin before moisturizer, morning and night.

description: A hydrating serum enriched with hyaluronic acid and vitamin B5 to plump and hydrate the skin.

name: Vitamin C Brightening Cream

details.Usage: Apply to clean skin morning and night.

description: A luxurious cream infused with vitamin C and hyaluronic acid to brighten and even out skin tone.

name: Anti-Aging Eye Cream

details.Usage: Gently pat a small amount around the eye area morning and night.

description: A nourishing eye cream formulated with retinol and peptides to reduce signs of aging and hydrate the delicate eye area.

name: Gentle Exfoliating Toner

details.Usage: Apply to a cotton pad and swipe over clean skin morning and night.

description: A gentle exfoliating toner that helps to remove dead skin cells and balance the skin's pH levels.

name: Daily SPF 50 Sunscreen

details.Usage: Apply liberally to face and neck every morning.

description: A lightweight daily sunscreen with SPF 50 that provides broad-spectrum protection and hydration.

name: Anti-Acne Spot Treatment

details.Usage: Apply directly to blemishes as needed.

description: An effective spot treatment formulated with salicylic acid and tea tree oil to target and minimize acne blemishes.

name: Gentle Foaming Cleanser

details.Usage: Apply to damp skin, massage, and rinse thoroughly.

description: A gentle foaming cleanser that effectively removes impurities without stripping the skin's natural moisture.

name: Hydrating Night Cream

details.Usage: Apply to clean, dry skin before bed.

description: A luxurious night cream enriched with shea butter and jojoba oil to deeply hydrate and nourish the skin while you sleep.

name: Anti-Pollution Facial Mist

details.Usage: Spritz onto face throughout the day as needed.

description: A refreshing facial mist infused with green tea extract and vitamin E to protect against environmental pollutants and refresh the skin.

name: Anti-Aging Neck Cream

details.Usage: Apply to clean, dry skin on the neck area morning and night.

description: An advanced neck cream formulated with peptides and hyaluronic acid to firm and hydrate the delicate skin on the neck.

name: Men's Casual Shirt
description: A classic casual shirt for men, perfect for everyday wear. Made from comfortable cotton with a regular fit and long sleeves. Features a button-down collar.

name: Women's Summer Dress
description: A stylish and comfortable summer dress for women. Made from lightweight rayon with a loose fit and short sleeves. Features a flattering V-neckline.

name: Men's Formal Suit
description: A sophisticated formal suit for men, perfect for business meetings and special occasions. Crafted from a luxurious wool blend with a slim fit jacket and flat front trousers.

name: Women's Denim Jeans
description: Classic denim jeans for women, perfect for casual outings. Made from durable denim fabric with a slim fit and straight leg design. Features a high-rise waist.

name: Men's Chino Pants
description: Stylish chino pants for men, perfect for a smart casual look. Made from comfortable cotton blend fabric with a slim fit and zipper fly closure.

name: Men's Hoodie
description: A comfortable and stylish hoodie for men, perfect for layering. Made from a soft cotton blend with a regular fit and long sleeves. Features a hood for added warmth.

name: Women's Blouse
description: A versatile blouse for women, perfect for both casual and formal occasions. Made from luxurious silk with a loose fit and short sleeves. Features a round neckline.

name: Men's Polo Shirt
description: A classic polo shirt for men, perfect for a casual yet polished look. Made from comfortable cotton with a slim fit and short sleeves. Features a polo collar.

name: Women's Cardigan
description: A cozy and stylish cardigan for women, perfect for layering in cooler weather. Made from warm wool with a regular fit and long sleeves. Features button closure.

name: Men's Cargo Shorts
description: Stylish cargo shorts for men, perfect for casual outings in warm weather. Made from comfortable cotton with a regular fit and cargo pockets. Features a button closure.

name: Women's Skirt
description: A stylish skirt for women, perfect for both casual and semi-formal occasions. Made from durable polyester with a slim fit and knee-length design. Features a zipper closure.

name: Men's T-Shirt
description: A basic essential for every man's wardrobe, this t-shirt offers both comfort and style. Made from soft cotton with a regular fit and short sleeves. Features a classic round neckline.

name: Women's Leggings
description: Versatile leggings for women, perfect for both active and casual wear. Made from stretchy spandex with a slim fit and ankle-length design. Features an elastic waist for comfort.

name: Men's Swim Shorts
description: Stylish swim shorts for men, perfect for poolside or beach outings. Made from a quick-drying polyester blend with a regular fit and drawstring closure. Features side pockets for convenience.

name: Women's Tank Top
description: A must-have staple for every woman's wardrobe, this tank top offers comfort and style. Made from soft cotton with a slim fit and sleeveless design. Features a scoop neckline.

name: UltraBook Pro 15
description: The UltraBook Pro 15 is a powerful and sleek laptop designed for professionals. With an Intel Core i7 processor, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 graphics, and a vibrant 15.6" Full HD display, it delivers exceptional performance and stunning visuals.

name: ZenBook 14
description: The ZenBook 14 is an ultra-portable laptop that combines elegance with performance. Featuring an Intel Core i5 processor, Intel UHD Graphics, and a stunning 14" Full HD display, it's perfect for productivity on the go.

name: Swift 3
description: The Swift 3 is a stylish and lightweight laptop with powerful performance. Equipped with an AMD Ryzen 7 processor, AMD Radeon Graphics, and a crisp 13.5" Full HD display, it's perfect for multitasking and entertainment.

name: Surface Laptop 4
description: The Surface Laptop 4 combines performance with versatility. Featuring an Intel Core i7 processor, Intel Iris Xe Graphics, and a stunning 15" PixelSense display, it's perfect for work, creativity, and entertainment.

name: ThinkPad X1 Carbon
description: The ThinkPad X1 Carbon is the ultimate business laptop. With an Intel Core i7 processor, Intel Iris Xe Graphics, and a durable yet lightweight design, it's built to handle any task with ease.

name: MacBook Pro 16
description: The MacBook Pro 16 is a powerhouse of creativity. With an Intel Core i9 processor, AMD Radeon Pro 5600M graphics, and a stunning 16" Retina display, it's perfect for professionals and creatives alike.

name: ROG Zephyrus G14
description: The ROG Zephyrus G14 is a compact gaming powerhouse. With an AMD Ryzen 9 processor, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 graphics, and a stunning 14" QHD display, it delivers uncompromising performance in a portable package.

name: Dell XPS 15
description: The Dell XPS 15 is a premium laptop designed for performance and productivity. With an Intel Core i9 processor, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 Ti graphics, and a stunning 15.6" 4K UHD display, it's perfect for demanding tasks and multimedia.

name: Surface Laptop Go
description: The Surface Laptop Go is a lightweight and affordable laptop for everyday use. With an Intel Core i5 processor, Intel UHD Graphics, and a vibrant 12.4" PixelSense display, it's perfect for work, school, and entertainment.

name: HP Spectre x360
description: The HP Spectre x360 is a versatile convertible laptop with impressive performance and stunning design. With an Intel Core i7 processor, Intel Iris Xe Graphics, and a brilliant 13.3" 4K UHD display, it's perfect for work, creativity, and entertainment.

name: Acer Predator Helios 300
description: The Acer Predator Helios 300 is a powerful gaming laptop built for performance. With an Intel Core i7 processor, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 graphics, and a high-refresh-rate 15.6" Full HD display, it delivers smooth gaming experiences.

name: Lenovo Legion 5
description: The Lenovo Legion 5 is a versatile gaming laptop with powerful performance and immersive visuals. With an AMD Ryzen 7 processor, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 graphics, and a high-refresh-rate 15.6" Full HD display, it's perfect for gaming and multitasking.

name: Geometric Wall Art Set
description: Enhance your living space with this stylish Geometric Wall Art Set. Crafted from high-quality wood, these pieces feature modern geometric designs that will add a touch of elegance to any room.

name: Vintage Persian Rug
description: Add a touch of luxury to your home with this exquisite Vintage Persian Rug. Handcrafted from premium wool, this rug features traditional Persian designs and rich colors that will complement any decor.

name: Marble Table Lamp
description: Illuminate your space with this elegant Marble Table Lamp. Featuring a sleek marble base and a modern design, this lamp will add a sophisticated touch to your bedside table or desk.

name: Velvet Throw Pillow Set
description: Add a pop of color and texture to your living room or bedroom with this luxurious Velvet Throw Pillow Set. These soft and stylish pillows are perfect for cozying up on the couch or adding a decorative accent to your bed.

name: Metal Wall Shelf
description: Maximize your wall space with this sleek Metal Wall Shelf. Crafted from durable metal, this industrial-style shelf provides the perfect display space for plants, books, and decorative items.

name: Bohemian Macrame Wall Hanging
description: Add a touch of bohemian charm to your space with this beautiful Macrame Wall Hanging. Handcrafted from soft cotton, this intricate piece features intricate knotwork and fringe details that will elevate any room.

name: Scandinavian Throw Blanket
description: Stay cozy and stylish with this Scandinavian Throw Blanket. Made from soft cotton, this blanket features a minimalist design and neutral colors that will complement any decor.

name: Ceramic Vase Set
description: Add a touch of elegance to your home with this Ceramic Vase Set. Featuring a modern design and glossy finish, these vases are perfect for displaying flowers or as standalone decor pieces.

name: Wooden Floating Shelves
description: Create a stunning display with these Wooden Floating Shelves. Crafted from reclaimed wood, these rustic shelves are perfect for showcasing your favorite books, plants, and decorative items.

name: Moroccan Pouf Ottoman
description: Add a touch of exotic flair to your space with this Moroccan Pouf Ottoman. Handcrafted from genuine leather, this pouf features traditional Moroccan designs and vibrant colors that will liven up any room.

name: Glass Terrarium Set
description: Create your own mini garden with this Glass Terrarium Set. Featuring modern geometric designs, these terrariums are perfect for displaying succulents, air plants, or small decorative items.

name: Abstract Canvas Wall Art
description: Make a statement in any room with this stunning Abstract Canvas Wall Art. Featuring bold colors and dynamic shapes, this piece will add a modern touch to your home decor.

name: Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra
description: The Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra is the ultimate flagship smartphone with a stunning display, powerful performance, and exceptional camera capabilities.

name: iPhone 13 Pro Max
description: Experience the power of the A15 Bionic chip and the beauty of the Super Retina XDR display with the iPhone 13 Pro Max. Capture stunning photos and videos with the advanced camera system.

name: Google Pixel 6 Pro
description: The Google Pixel 6 Pro combines advanced AI features with a stunning design and exceptional camera capabilities, making it the perfect smartphone for capturing and sharing your life's moments.

name: OnePlus 9 Pro
description: The OnePlus 9 Pro delivers a smooth and fast experience with its Fluid AMOLED display and Snapdragon 888 processor. Capture stunning photos with Hasselblad's advanced camera technology.

name: Xiaomi Mi 11 Ultra
description: The Xiaomi Mi 11 Ultra redefines smartphone photography with its powerful camera system featuring a 50MP main sensor. Enjoy a stunning display and fast performance with the Snapdragon 888 processor.

name: Sony Xperia 1 III
description: Experience cinema-quality entertainment on the go with the Sony Xperia 1 III's 4K HDR OLED display. Capture stunning photos and videos with its versatile camera system.

name: Asus ROG Phone 5
description: Unleash your gaming potential with the Asus ROG Phone 5. Featuring a 144Hz AMOLED display and Snapdragon 888 processor, it delivers smooth and responsive gaming performance.

name: Motorola Edge 20 Pro
description: The Motorola Edge 20 Pro combines style and performance with its sleek design and Snapdragon 870 processor. Capture stunning photos and videos with its advanced camera system.

name: LG Wing
description: Experience multitasking like never before with the LG Wing's unique swivel design. Enjoy immersive entertainment and smooth performance with its P-OLED display and Snapdragon 765G processor.

name: Realme GT 5G
description: The Realme GT 5G offers blazing-fast performance and a stunning display at an affordable price. Capture clear and detailed photos with its advanced camera system.

name: Huawei Mate 40 Pro
description: Experience flagship-level performance and photography with the Huawei Mate 40 Pro. Its powerful Kirin 9000 processor and Leica quad-camera system deliver stunning results in every shot.

name: Nokia 8.3 5G
description: Stay connected with the Nokia 8.3 5G's high-quality display and fast performance. Capture clear and detailed photos with its versatile quad-camera system.

name: Black Shark 4 Pro
description: Immerse yourself in gaming with the Black Shark 4 Pro's high-refresh-rate display and powerful hardware. Its Snapdragon 888 processor ensures smooth and responsive gaming performance.

name: Lenovo Legion Phone Duel 2
description: Unleash your gaming potential with the Lenovo Legion Phone Duel 2. Its unique design and powerful hardware provide an immersive gaming experience like no other.

name: ZTE Axon 30 Ultra
description: Capture every moment in stunning detail with the ZTE Axon 30 Ultra's advanced camera system. Its powerful hardware ensures smooth performance for all your tasks.

name: POCO F3
description: Experience flagship-level performance at an affordable price with the POCO F3. Its high-refresh-rate display and powerful processor ensure smooth performance in gaming and multitasking.

name: Meizu 18 Pro
description: Enjoy a premium experience with the Meizu 18 Pro's high-quality display and powerful hardware. Its advanced camera system ensures stunning photos in any lighting condition.

name: Infinix Zero X Pro
description: Experience powerful performance and stunning photography with the Infinix Zero X Pro. Its AMOLED display and advanced camera system make it the perfect companion for capturing your adventures.

name: Tecno Camon 18P
description: Capture every moment with the Tecno Camon 18P's AI-powered camera system. Its large display and long-lasting battery make it the perfect device for entertainment and productivity.

name: Vivo Y72 5G
description: Experience fast and reliable performance with the Vivo Y72 5G. Its large display and 5G connectivity make it the perfect device for streaming, gaming, and multitasking.
